output.sentences: I was fortunate enough to accompany my husband on his business trip to the middle east.
Instead of sitting in our hotel I decided to explore the city.
While I was out I had a manicure and even visited the embassy
I saw a list of countries at the embassy, but had no clue what itwas about.
When my husband was finished with his meetings he took me to a popular restaurant for dinner.
